# Warm-up for R

# Define Variables 
```{r}
textual_variable="croatia"
numeric_variable=3.14
list_of_variables = c(1,3,5)
```

# Conditions

```{r}
another_value = 5
another_value == 33
```

```{r}
another_value = 5
if(another_value == numeric_variable){
  print("Values are equal")
}else{
  print("Values are different")
}
```

# Comparison operator

```{r}
another_value != numeric_variable
another_value > numeric_variable
another_value < numeric_variable

```

# Loops
```{r}
list_of_variables = c(1,3,5)
for(i in list_of_variables){
  print(i)
}
```
